House, Mike Pence said Republicans "welcome the president's call" for Social Security reform. "I think the only danger House Republicans have today is in not being bold enough," he said. I think the American people are tired of half-measures. They're looking for men and women at every level of government who are willing to step up and speak the truth and to offer positive solutions to deal with the fiscal crisis that we're facing. That includes domestic spending. That includes reasonable pruning and efficiencies within our defense complex. But it also includes entitlement reform. David McQueen, principal analyst at Informa, said The more competition there is in the smartphone space, the greater the innovation, the better the devices that emerge. Ultimately it will be users who choose what phones they want to buy. So far, fewer people are choosing Nokia or Microsoft than the two companies need. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series "Cheers" and "Frasier."
